title: Speaker with Stand (model L 02)
medium: Mesh, nickel-plated steel rod, and painted steel bracket and base
dimensions:
Overall: variable height reaching maximum of 56 1/2" (143.5 cm)
.a (speaker): 7 1/8 x 7 1/8 x 3 1/4" (18.1 x 18.1 x 8.3 cm)
.b (vertical rod and base): 28 1/4 x 10 1/4" (71.7 x 26 cm)
.c (rod extension): 28" (71.1 cm)
.d (bracket): 1 5/8 x 7 1/2 x 1 1/8" (4.1 x 19 x 2.9 cm)
